events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has multiple scratches and seems broken. I’m very disappointed as this is not what I expected.
The issue has been classified under Product Defect since the customer reports damage and scratches on the received item.
Assigning the case to the product quality support team to evaluate the defect and provide a solution.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your product. I’m here to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and damage on the product so we can assess the problem accurately?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches and a small broken part near the handle. Please let me know how this can be fixed.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product or a partial refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement as I really like the product. Thank you for your prompt response and solution.
We have processed a replacement order for you. It should arrive within 5 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the replacement product and if everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thank you very much for your assistance.
We are glad to hear that the replacement product meets your expectations. Closing the case now, and feel free to contact us anytime.
